short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block YouTube shorts and remind to save dopamine!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block YouTube Shorts and stay focused! This extension prevents Shorts from playing and displays a reminder to use your time productively. Take control of your viewing habits and avoid distractions. Easy to use, with a handy "Go Back" button. Reclaim your dopamine for what matters most!
